definition: A term used to describe someone who displays courteous and considerate behavior towards others, often going out of their way to be helpful and accommodating. This word is commonly used to describe individuals who are polite, friendly, and proactive in their interactions with others.

examples.german: Er war sehr zuvorkommend und hat uns bei allem geholfen.
examples.english: He was very accommodating and helped us with everything.

examples.german: Der Kellner war äußerst zuvorkommend und hat uns ausgezeichnet bedient.
examples.english: The waiter was extremely attentive and served us excellently.

examples.german: Sie war immer freundlich und zuvorkommend zu ihren Kunden.
examples.english: She was always friendly and courteous to her customers.

examples.german: Der Empfang war sehr zuvorkommend und hat uns herzlich willkommen geheißen.
examples.english: The reception was very welcoming and greeted us warmly.

examples.german: Er ist ein zuvorkommender Gastgeber und sorgt immer für das Wohl seiner Gäste.
examples.english: He is an attentive host and always takes care of the well-being of his guests.
